task.summary: installed and enabled laravel-ide-helper, updated composer.json
acl system development started, first routes and pages for admin functions
made authorization as laravel gates, changed database a little bit(added permissions to roles table), new model: role, updated user model, created some pages and menu items
each new user has guest role now
created admin page for editing categories (create, edit, delete and other)
added auth:api middleware for categoryApi, added new field - api_token in user table, modified user access-gate method (hasAccess);
fixed bugs in api auth service
